movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: Various interconnected stories of criminals in the Los Angeles underworld.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy through Carter are seen through the eyes of a mentally disabled man.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A young hobbit, Frodo, who has found the One Ring, begins his journey with eight companions to Mount Doom, the only place where the Ring can be destroyed.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A hotel concierge and his protégé become involved in the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto in World War II.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea.

movies.title: Memento
movies.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: Shang-Chi, the master of unarmed weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

movies.title: A Quiet Place Part II
movies.description: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now faces the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path.

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Spider-Man's identity is revealed, and he seeks help from Doctor Strange. However, things take an unexpected turn, and Peter Parker finds himself dealing with villains from different realities.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.description: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

movies.title: Shazam!
movies.description: A teenage foster child turns into an adult superhero by uttering the magic word 'Shazam!' He must learn to control his newfound powers and face the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers take one final stand against the powerful Thanos in the epic conclusion to the Infinity Saga.

movies.title: Wonder Woman 1984
movies.description: Diana Prince must contend with a new threat, the charismatic businessman Maxwell Lord, and the mysterious Cheetah, while dealing with the return of her lost love, Steve Trevor.

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
movies.description: Doctor Strange faces dark forces while dealing with the consequences of tampering with the multiverse.

movies.title: Aquaman
movies.description: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movies.description: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.

movies.title: Deadpool
movies.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

movies.title: Venom
movies.description: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movies.description: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

movies.title: Captain Marvel
movies.description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

movies.title: Ant-Man and The Wasp
movies.description: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

movies.title: The Banker
movies.description: In the 1960s, two African American entrepreneurs hire a working-class white man to pretend to be the head of their business empire while they pose as a janitor and chauffeur.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads a rebellion against the oppressive English rule.

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.description: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

movies.title: The Notebook
movies.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

movies.title: Pride and Prejudice
movies.description: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a mysterious woman, Furiosa, to try and survive.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.description: An ex-hitman seeks vengeance for the killing of his dog, a gift from his deceased wife.

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies.title: Dumb and Dumber
movies.description: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
movies.description: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
movies.description: Super-assassin John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassin's guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hitmen and women everywhere.

movies.title: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
movies.description: The incredibly true adventure of two friends from completely different worlds who inadvertently start the ultimate 'dude band.

movies.title: Dumb and Dumber To
movies.description: Twenty years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.description: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

movies.title: Mad Max
movies.description: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

movies.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
movies.description: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

movies.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
movies.description: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post-apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

movies.title: The Hunger Games
movies.description: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
movies.description: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
movies.description: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
movies.description: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

movies.title: Iron Man
movies.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight against evil.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

movies.title: Thor
movies.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.description: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movies.description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong, and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum'. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

movies.title: Ant-Man
movies.description: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

movies.title: Man of Steel
movies.description: Clark Kent, one of the last of an extinguished race disguised as an unremarkable human, is forced to reveal his identity when Earth is invaded by an army of survivors who threaten to bring the planet to the brink of destruction.

movies.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
movies.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

movies.title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
movies.description: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

movies.title: The Suicide Squad
movies.description: Task Force X, a.k.a. the Suicide Squad, is sent to the island nation of Corto Maltese to destroy Jotunheim, a Nazi-era prison and laboratory.

movies.title: The Matrix Reloaded
movies.description: Neo and the rebel leaders race against time to find the Machine City before it destroys Zion.

movies.title: The Matrix Revolutions
movies.description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

movies.title: Carrie
movies.description: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

movies.title: Pet Sematary
movies.description: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

movies.title: Misery
movies.description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

movies.title: Stand by Me
movies.description: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

movies.title: Doctor Sleep
movies.description: Years following the events of 'The Shining,' a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal.

movies.title: The Mist
movies.description: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

movies.title: Dolores Claiborne
movies.description: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious
movies.description: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

movies.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
movies.description: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
movies.description: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

movies.title: Fast & Furious
movies.description: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

movies.title: Fast Five
movies.description: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

movies.title: Fast & Furious 6
movies.description: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

movies.title: Furious 7
movies.description: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

movies.title: The Fate of the Furious
movies.description: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew faces trials that will test them as never before.

movies.title: F9: The Fast Saga
movies.description: Cipher enlists the help of Jakob, Dom's younger brother, to take revenge on Dom and his team.

tv_shows.title: Stranger Things
tv_shows.description: A group of kids in a small town uncover supernatural mysteries.

tv_shows.title: Game of Thrones
tv_shows.description: Power struggles among noble families in the mythical land of Westeros.

tv_shows.title: Breaking Bad
tv_shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student.

tv_shows.title: Friends
tv_shows.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six friends living in Manhattan.

tv_shows.title: The Simpsons
tv_shows.description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

tv_shows.title: The Office
tv_shows.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

tv_shows.title: The Mandalorian
tv_shows.description: A lone bounty hunter makes his way through the outer reaches of the galaxy.

tv_shows.title: Rick and Morty
tv_shows.description: A sociopathic genius scientist who drags his inherently timid grandson on insanely dangerous adventures across the universe

tv_shows.title: Black Mirror
tv_shows.description: A series of stand-alone dramas that are sharp, suspenseful, satirical tales that explore techno-paranoia.

tv_shows.title: The Witcher
tv_shows.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

tv_shows.title: Daredevil
tv_shows.description: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.

tv_shows.title: Jessica Jones
tv_shows.description: Following a tragic end to her superhero career, Jessica Jones tries to rebuild her life as a private investigator.

tv_shows.title: Luke Cage
tv_shows.description: When a sabotaged experiment gives him super strength and unbreakable skin, Luke Cage becomes a fugitive attempting to rebuild his life in Harlem.

tv_shows.title: The Punisher
tv_shows.description: After the murder of his family, Marine veteran Frank Castle becomes the vigilante known as 'The Punisher.'

tv_shows.title: WandaVision
tv_shows.description: Living idealized suburban lives, super-powered beings Wanda and Vision begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

tv_shows.title: Iron Fist
tv_shows.description: A young man with mystical powers returns to New York City to fight crime and corruption as the Iron Fist.

tv_shows.title: Marvel's The Defenders
tv_shows.description: Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and Iron Fist team up to protect New York City.

tv_shows.title: Hawkeye
tv_shows.description: Former Avenger Clint Barton teams up with Kate Bishop, a young archer, to save the city from an underground criminal conspiracy.

tv_shows.title: Marvel's Agent Carter
tv_shows.description: In 1946, Peggy Carter must balance the routine office work at the Strategic Scientific Reserve (SSR) with secretly assisting Howard Stark in his missions.

tv_shows.title: Marvel's Runaways
tv_shows.description: Six teenagers discover that their parents are part of an evil criminal organization. They unite against their parents and set out to stop them.

tv_shows.title: Moon Knight
tv_shows.description: A former Marine with dissociative identity disorder gains powers and becomes the vigilante Moon Knight.

tv_shows.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
tv_shows.description: Follows the hilarious antics of the detectives of the 99th precinct of the New York City Police Department.

tv_shows.title: The Good Place
tv_shows.description: A woman realizes she hasn't been a good person and must navigate the afterlife to earn her place in 'The Good Place.'

tv_shows.title: Parks and Recreation
tv_shows.description: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

tv_shows.title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
tv_shows.description: A housewife in the 1950s decides to become a stand-up comic.

tv_shows.title: American Horror Story
tv_shows.description: An anthology series that centers on different characters and locations, including a haunted house, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show, and a hotel.

tv_shows.title: The Exorcist
tv_shows.description: Two priests work together to perform exorcisms and combat demonic possessions in a small town.

tv_shows.title: The Haunting of Hill House
tv_shows.description: A fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.

tv_shows.title: The Walking Dead
tv_shows.description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

tv_shows.title: Bates Motel
tv_shows.description: A contemporary prequel to Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho, depicting the life of Norman Bates and his mother Norma.

tv_shows.title: Suits
tv_shows.description: A talented college dropout starts practicing law at a prestigious New York law firm despite having no legal degree.

tv_shows.title: Doctor Who
tv_shows.description: The adventures of the Doctor, a Time Lord from the planet Gallifrey who travels through time and space in the TARDIS.

tv_shows.title: Invincible
tv_shows.description: An ordinary teenager's father is the most powerful superhero on the planet. As he inherits his father's powers, he discovers the truth about his father's legacy.

tv_shows.title: The Flash
tv_shows.description: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen becomes the superhero known as the Flash and fights crime in Central City.

tv_shows.title: Hell's Kitchen
tv_shows.description: Aspiring chefs compete for the opportunity to work in one of the world's finest restaurants under the guidance of renowned chef Gordon Ramsay.

tv_shows.title: Halo
tv_shows.description: An adaptation of the popular video game series, following the adventures of Master Chief as he battles against various threats.

tv_shows.title: Castlevania
tv_shows.description: A vampire hunter fights to save a city besieged by an army of otherworldly creatures controlled by Dracula himself.

tv_shows.title: Assassin's Creed: Lineage
tv_shows.description: A three-part film that serves as a prequel to the video game Assassin's Creed II, following the story of Giovanni Auditore da Firenze.

tv_shows.title: Street Fighter: Assassin's Fist
tv_shows.description: A multi-layered series exploring the origin stories of iconic Street Fighter characters Ryu and Ken.

tv_shows.title: The Expanse
tv_shows.description: A conspiracy threatens peace across the solar system as a disparate group of characters uncover the greatest conspiracy in human history.

tv_shows.title: BoJack Horseman
tv_shows.description: BoJack Horseman, a washed-up actor from the '90s, plans his big return to celebrity relevance with his tell-all autobiography.

tv_shows.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
tv_shows.description: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar.

tv_shows.title: Sherlock
tv_shows.description: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

tv_shows.title: Peaky Blinders
tv_shows.description: A gangster family epic set in Birmingham, England, in 1919, just after the First World War.

tv_shows.title: Family Guy
tv_shows.description: In a wacky Rhode Island town, a dysfunctional family strives to cope with everyday life as they are thrown from one crazy scenario to another.

tv_shows.title: Squid Game
tv_shows.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits—with deadly high stakes.

tv_shows.title: Loki
tv_shows.description: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of 'Avengers: Endgame.'

tv_shows.title: Harley Quinn
tv_shows.description: Harley Quinn has finally broken things off once and for all with the Joker and attempts to make it on her own as the criminal Queenpin of Gotham City.

tv_shows.title: The Sopranos
tv_shows.description: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

tv_shows.title: The Boys
tv_shows.description: In a world where superheroes embrace the darker side of their massive celebrity and fame, a group of vigilantes known as 'The Boys' sets out to take down corrupt superheroes with no more than blue-collar grit and a willingness to fight dirty.

tv_shows.title: The Good Doctor
tv_shows.description: A young surgeon with autism and savant syndrome is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital. The question will arise: Can a person who doesn't have the ability to relate to people actually save their lives?

tv_shows.title: Mr. Robot
tv_shows.description: A young programmer becomes involved in a cyber-anarchy group and must deal with the consequences.

tv_shows.title: Homeland
tv_shows.description: A bipolar CIA operative becomes convinced a prisoner of war has been turned by al-Qaeda and is planning to carry out a terrorist attack on American soil.

tv_shows.title: The Wire
tv_shows.description: Baltimore drug scene, seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

tv_shows.title: Outlander
tv_shows.description: An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.

tv_shows.title: The Queen's Gambit
tv_shows.description: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA. But, child stardom comes at a price.

tv_shows.title: True Detective
tv_shows.description: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

tv_shows.title: The Handmaid's Tale
tv_shows.description: In a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

tv_shows.title: Fargo
tv_shows.description: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue, and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.

tv_shows.title: Vikings
tv_shows.description: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore and raid the distant shores across the ocean.

tv_shows.title: The Umbrella Academy
tv_shows.description: A family of former child heroes, now grown apart, must reunite to continue to protect the world.

tv_shows.title: Better Call Saul
tv_shows.description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the time before he established his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

tv_shows.title: The 100
tv_shows.description: Set ninety-seven years after a nuclear war has destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends one hundred juvenile delinquents back to Earth, in hopes of possibly re-populating the planet.

tv_shows.title: Lucifer
tv_shows.description: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity.

tv_shows.title: Arrow
tv_shows.description: Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.
